Sentencas: This short communication describes a novel MoO2-based cathode and its potential application for solid oxide electrolysis cells.
Titulo: MoO2-based cathode for CO2 and H2O electrolysis

Sentencas: Electrochemical performances of the MoO2-based cathode are investigated with respect to a commercial Ni/YSZ-based cathode for both co-electrolysis (of H2O and CO2) and electrolysis of only CO2 at 750 degrees C.
Titulo: MoO2-based cathode for CO2 and H2O electrolysis

Sentencas: Under the co-electrolysis mode, the MoO(-)based cell and the Ni/YSZ cell show a similar electro-hemical performance, while in the CO2 electrolysis mode, the MoO2-based cell demonstrates a much improved electrocatalytic activity compared with the Ni/YSZ cell.
Titulo: MoO2-based cathode for CO2 and H2O electrolysis

Sentencas: This improved electrochemical activity of the MoO2-based cathode under the CO2 electrolysis mode is further investigated by its electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) study.
Titulo: MoO2-based cathode for CO2 and H2O electrolysis

Sentencas: According to our EIS study, the polarization resistance of the MoO2-based cell is 67% lower than that of the Ni/YSZ-based cell under the open circuit potential.
Titulo: MoO2-based cathode for CO2 and H2O electrolysis

Sentencas: A performance stability study indicates that the MoO2-based cell exhibits a relatively low performance degradation under the CO2 electrolysis mode during its 10-h constant voltage test, and low carbon amount (6.6 wt.%) is detected after the performance stability measurement.
Titulo: MoO2-based cathode for CO2 and H2O electrolysis

Sentencas: These findings suggest the advantages of applying the MoO2-based cathode for the CO2 electrolysis.
Titulo: MoO2-based cathode for CO2 and H2O electrolysis
